trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> instances and is used for properties whose <xref href="System.Type"></xref> is a collection.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueCollection"></xref> class as a sub-property to the specified parent <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref>.
The parent <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref>.
Adds an object into the collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> objects.
The object to add to the collection.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> for the added object.
Notifies listeners of dynamic changes to the collection, such as when items get added and removed or the whole list is refreshed.
Gets the number of items in a collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> objects.
An <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> number of items.

Returns a strongly typed <xref href="Systems.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> that iterates through the collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> objects.
An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1"></xref> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
Inserts a specified object at the specified index in a collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> objects.
The object to add to the collection.
The index number that specifies where to insert the object into the collection.
A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> for the added object.
Returns a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> from a collection at the given index.
The index of the item to be returned.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> at that index.
Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueCollection.CollectionChanged"></xref> event when items in the collection are added, removed, or resorted.
Event arguments that contain information about the change in the collection.
Gets the parent <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> object that contains the collection.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> of the parent.
Removes the object from the collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> objects.
The host needs to ensure that the PropertyValue is invalid after the object is removed.
The item to remove from the collection.
`true` if removal is successful; otherwise, `false`.
Removes the object from the collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> objects at the specified index.
The index of the item to remove.

Recalculates the indexes in a collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> objects after an existing item is moved to a new position in the collection.
The current position index of the object in the collection.
The index position to which the item is moved.
Returns a strongly typed <xref href="Systems.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> for a collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> objects.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
